title: Verify global layout rendering and smooth scrolling context
description: Ensure that the root layout renders correctly with global styles, fonts, and enables smooth scrolling context for consistent look and feel across the site.

steps.description: Load the homepage
Verify that global styles and fonts defined in app/globals.css are applied
Verify the presence of smooth scrolling context provided by SmoothScroller component
Check smooth scrolling works using Lenis library on scroll events

title: Ensure React client components include "use client" directive
description: Verify all React client components that use browser APIs include the explicit "use client" directive to avoid hydration errors.

steps.description: Inspect all client components such as MagneticButton, GlassCard, and SmoothScroller for presence of "use client" directive
Confirm each client component that accesses browser APIs has "use client" directive at the top of the file

title: Validate no React hydration errors on initial render
description: Confirm that the site renders without any React hydration errors by ensuring semantic HTML and correct use of React 19 features.

steps.description: Load homepage and tour pages in different browsers
Check browser console to ensure no hydration errors are reported
Verify HTML structure is semantic and matches between server and client rendering

title: Verify smooth UI animations with GSAP and Lenis integration
description: Check that animations triggered by GSAP and scroll handling via Lenis behave smoothly without jank or frame drops.

steps.description: Navigate through homepage and tour pages
Verify GSAP animations trigger correctly on expected elements, e.g., MagneticButton hover, GlassCard appearance
Validate Lenis smooth scrolling behavior executes without stutter or latency

title: Confirm reusable UI components render consistently across pages
description: Ensure Buttons, GlassCard, Sections, and specialized components render with correct styles and functionality throughout the site.

steps.description: Load various pages like homepage, tour page
Verify Button components respond visually on hover and click
Verify GlassCard and MagneticButton render with correct styles and animations
Check accessibility attributes (aria-labels, roles) for these components

title: Validate Tailwind CSS v4 integration and configuration
description: Check that Tailwind CSS v4 is correctly configured without warnings or errors during development and build process.

steps.description: Build the project using the configured PostCSS and Tailwind CSS setup
Confirm no CSS warnings or errors related to Tailwind CSS v4 appear in terminal or VS Code Problems pane

title: Verify Next.js built-in image and font optimization for layout stability
description: Check that usage of next/image and next/font/local reduce cumulative layout shifts (CLS) and improve load performance on all pages.

steps.description: Load homepage and tour page while monitoring layout shifts using browser devtools performance tab
Verify images are implemented with next/image component and fonts with next/font/local
Check that CLS values are below acceptable thresholds (e.g., CLS < 0.1)

title: Functional end-to-end test of Tour booking flow
description: Verify that a user can successfully complete booking a tour including form filling, validation, submission, and confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to tour page
Select a tour from the available list
Fill out all required booking form fields with valid data
Submit the booking form
Verify successful booking confirmation message or page is shown
Confirm booking data is stored or transmitted correctly (if testable)

title: Tour booking form error handling for invalid inputs
description: Test validation and error messages for required fields, incorrect formats, and boundary cases in the tour booking form.

steps.description: Navigate to tour booking form
Leave required fields empty and attempt to submit
Ensure appropriate validation error messages are displayed for each missing field
Input invalid data formats (e.g., invalid email or date) and submit
Verify error messages are shown for invalid formats

title: Check package dependencies compatibility and stability
description: Ensure that all key package dependencies (Next.js 16, React 19, GSAP, Lenis, Tailwind CSS v4) are installed correctly and compatible without version conflicts.

steps.description: Inspect package.json and lockfile for dependency versions
Verify that installed packages correspond to intended versions without conflicts
Run 'npm audit' or equivalent to confirm no critical vulnerabilities

title: Validate accessibility compliance of reusable UI components
description: Confirm that all reusable UI components meet accessibility standards including keyboard navigation and ARIA attributes.

steps.description: Focus and navigate through UI components using keyboard only
Verify focus is visible and logical on Buttons, MagneticButton, GlassCard, and form elements
Confirm presence of ARIA roles and labels where appropriate
